messages.subject: Shinsengumi...IPOD
messages.msgSnippet: http://1happyturtle.com/Hosting/shinsengumiIPOD.jpg (the original source of the image is right on the file) ... I m trying to improve the
messages.messageBody:
http://1happyturtle.com/Hosting/shinsengumiIPOD.jpg
(the original source of the image is right on the file)
-------------------------------------------------
I'm trying to improve the http://www.shinsengumihq.com/links.htm
and I really need your help:

I have alot of links to dev-art accounts and fanfic writers who work
with the Shinsengumi however, in the past I've emailed them but no
one responds.

So I ask members here that if they have deviantart accounts with
Shinsengumi fanart please just let us know if they want us to link
to their page.

Also if anyone here blogs about Shinsengumi pop-culture or fanfic
please also notify shinsengumihq(a)yahoo.com and your link will be
added promptly

We do try to keep up with pop-culture however...that requires some
money which many of us do not have so we rely completely on
contributions. Purchasing manga/doujinshi and even scanning and
hosting material will raise the costs of our site. Therefore it is
a matter of lack of resources and time---*not interest.

For instance, Hirotada Tokugawa contributed scans
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/getsumeiseiki.htm
we posted them right away to this section
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/pop.htm

there are hundreds of Shinsengumi manga/doujinshi and as much as
we'd like to we don't have the resources to highlight them all---so
we need your help to keep us informed

anyone who wants to be a volunteer Shinsengumi pop-culture
correspondence raise your hand!!!! (^_^)

we are just a crossroad for many Shinsengumi fields whether it be
history, fanart, fanfic or movies
we are 100% driven by volunteers
